Is Cache expensive?

Cache's average home cost is $133,100.

Compared to nearby areas, Cache is a bit more expensive, and it is a lot less expensive compared to the United States as a whole. However, it's a little less expensive compared to Oklahoma City.

Nearby places

Medicine Park

Medicine Park is 9 miles northeast of Cache. The housing prices there are substantially more expensive. Its average home cost is $226,200, which comes out to $93,100 (69%) higher than Cache.

Faxon

Faxon is 12 miles south of Cache. Real estate prices there are pretty similar. The average home value there is $131,300, which works out to $1,800 (1%) lower than Cache.

Lawton

The city of Lawton is 9 miles east of Cache. Real estate prices there are somewhat less expensive. The average home price there is $112,800, which works out to $20,300 (15%) lower than Cache.

Chattanooga

Chattanooga is 15 miles south of Cache. The real estate prices there are significantly less expensive. Its average home value is $78,100, which is $55,000 (41%) lower than Cache.

Geronimo

Geronimo is 15 miles southeast of Cache. Housing prices there are substantially less expensive. Its average home value is $75,900, which works out to $57,200 (42%) lower than Cache.
